page.title: 15LIFE ON A FARM
page.content: THE FARMER HAS WORKED FOR ALL HIS WORKING LIFE FOR HIS LOVE OF HIS ANIMALS AND BECAUSE IT WAS ALWAYS HIS AMBITION TO TAKE OVER HIS FATHERS JOB AS A FARMER. HE HAS NO LIVING RELATIVES WORKING ON THE FARM SO HE HAS TO ORGANIZE EVERYTHING HIMSELF. HE HAS A DOG AS A PET WHICH IS ALSO THE FARM SHEEPDOG. THE FULL TIME WORKER HAS BEEN WORKING ON THE FARM FOR 36 YEARS.HE LIKES WORKING ON THE FARM BECAUSE HE LIKES HIS JOBS, WHICH ARE CUTTING THE CORN, COLLECTING THE EGGS AND FEEDING THE ANIMALS ETC . HE WORKS 6 DAYS A WEEK.
